metadata.name: Unbreakable Mirror
metadata.description:
This mod makes it impossible to break or damage the mirror leading to or from the Mirror World. No longer will your Mother runs be ended because of using Mama Mega or tossing a bomb near the mirror!
[hr][/hr] If you've enjoyed this mod, check out my other mod, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2730219441]Inseparable Jacob & Esau Plus[/url]!
